Articles.Content:
Sorry if this is a Repost, I've looked in the forum for a same post but there was no one.

Is there any Way to find out which Mod crashed the Game by Reading the Game Crash Logs or do I have to experiment with the mods to find out which one is the "Bad Guy"?

Best Regards Lukas

Btw. Sorry for my bad English...
Given how nobody has replied yet, seems like you'll have to figure it out yourself.
